edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_final

Class Gun

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_final.Gun
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Gun
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The gun that the player has. It has ammo and can be shot. Ammo can be replenished by stepping over the Bullet() powerup
    Author:
    Corey Perez, Eduardo Saenz, Lance Dall, Grant Posner, Bumjoong Kim, Jacob Chong
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      void reload()
      Used when the player walks over a Bullet powerup.
      void useBullet()
      Uses the ammo in the player's Gun() Reduces the ammo by 1
